landing.title: Thola iqembu elihambisana nawe
landing.subtitle: Phendula imibuzo ngezombusazwe zakho, ubone ukuthi yikuphi iqembu laseNingizimu Afrika elihambisana nemibono yakho.
landing.privacy: Izimpendulo zigcinwa kudivayisi yakho kuphela, azithunyelwa ndawo.

howItHelps.title: Ithuluzi likusize kanjani
howItHelps.intro: Qonda kahle lapho umi khona, wenze ivoti lakho libaluleke. Qhathanisa imibono yakho nezikhundla zamaqembu.

benefit1.title: Sika umsindo
benefit1.text: Dlula izithembiso; bona ukuthi amaqembu ahambisana kanjani nawe ezinqumweni zangempela.

benefit2.title: Thola okungalindelekile
benefit2.text: Thola amaqembu ongawazange uwacabange, ngokusekelwe ekuhambisaneni kwezinqumo, hhayi udumo.

benefit3.title: Bona zonke izimphumela
benefit3.text: Thola uhlu oluhlelwe ngamaphuzu kuwo wonke amaqembu—ubone ozimele phezulu namanye ongawacabanga.

benefit4.title: Vota ngokuzethemba
benefit4.text: Yenza isinqumo esaziwayo esisekelwe kudatha—imibono yakho iqhathaniswa nezikhundla zamaqembu.

about.title: Mayelana ne-Elekti
about.methodologyText: I-Elekti isebenzisa indlela esekelwe kuma-eksisi angu-12 ukuqhathanisa imibono yakho nezikhundla zamaqembu aseNingizimu Afrika. Uhlelo lwethu lufaneleke, lukhanyile, futhi aluthathi hlangothi.
about.howItWorksText: Uphendula imibuzo engama-50 ngezindawo ezahlukene—ezomnotho, ezokuphatha, ezokulingana njll. Umbuzo ngamunye uhlotshaniswa ne-eksisi ethile futhi unesilinganiso sawo. Izimpendulo zakho ziguqulwa zibe izikhundla kuma-eksisi bese ziqhathaniswa nezikhundla zamaqembu.
about.scoringText: I-algorithm yethu isebenza kanje: (1) Impendulo ngayinye iqhathaniswa nesikhundla seqembu kuleyo eksisi, sibala ukuhambisana (1 minus umehluko). (2) Ukuhambisana kuphindaphindwa ngesilinganiso sombuzo bese kuhlanganiswa nge-eksisi. (3) Amaphuzu e-eksisi anormaliswa ngephesenti lesisindo. (4) Iphuzu lokugcina liwukuhleleka okulinganiselwe kuma-eksisi onke. Amaphuzu aboniswa ngamaphesenti, futhi sinikeza izinga lokuzethemba ngokusekelwe kumaphuzu aphezulu nokuhlukana kuwo.
about.transparencyText: Izikhundla zamaqembu kanye izisindo zamibuzo zisekelwe ocwaningweni lwemibhalo esemthethweni yamaqembu. Indlela ivulekile futhi ingabuyekezwa. Asithathi hlangothi—sifuna ukukusiza wenze isinqumo esisekelwe kudatha.
about.dataSourcesText: Izikhundla ziqoqwa kumamanifeseto, izinqubomgomo, amarekhodi okhetho kanye nezitatimende eziqinisekisiwe. Siyabuyekezela idatha njalo. Uma kukhona okungalungile, wamukelekile ukusazisa ngebufakazi.
about.privacyText: Imfihlo yakho ibalulekile. Sibheka imibono yakho ngezombusazwe njengento yomuntu siqu okufanele ivikelwe.
about.noTrackingText: Asisebenzisi ama-cookie noma amathuluzi okulandelela. Asiboni izimpendulo zakho futhi azidluliselwa kumaseva ethu.
about.localOnlyText: Konke kwenzeka ku-browser yakho. Izimpendulo zigcinwa kudivayisi yakho kuphela. Uma usula idatha, imiphumela iyanyamalala.
about.sharingText: Uma wabelana imiphumela, izimpendulo zifakwa ngqo ku-URL. Akuthunyelwa kumaseva—ulawula ukuthi ubani oyibona.
about.analyticsText: Sisebenzisa i-Cloudflare Web Analytics—ayisebenzisi ama-cookie futhi ayilandeleli abantu. Iyasiza kuphela ngezibalo ezijwayelekile ngaphandle kokulimaza imfihlo yakho.
about.partiesText: Sifaka amaqembu angu-16 anombono ohlukene ku-spectrum yezombusazwe. Ukukhetha kusekelwe ekubalulekeni nasekuhlukaneni kwezimvo.
about.disclaimerText: I-Elekti iyithuluzi lokufundisa, hhayi esikhundleni socwaningo. Amaqembu ayinkimbinkimbi futhi izikhundla ziyashintsha. Funda amanifeseto, hamba emihlanganweni, futhi uqinisekise ulwazi ngokwakho. Le miphumela ikhombisa ukuhambisana ngezikhundla ezishiwo—ukuphatha sangempela kungahluka.
about.viewDataText: Ungahlola amafayela ethu e-JSON: izikhundla zamaqembu, izisindo, kanye nedatha yemibuzo esetshenziswa i-algorithm.

anc.desc: I-African National Congress (ANC) iyibandla elibusayo laseNingizimu Afrika. Ligcizelela ukulingana, ukuguqulwa koMnotho, nokwandiswa kwezinsiza zomphakathi.

da.desc: I-Democratic Alliance (DA) igcizelela inkululeko yomuntu, umnotho oholwa yimakethe, nokubusa okuhle ngokulawulwa okucacile.

mk.desc: uMkhonto weSizwe Party (MK) igcizelela ukuguqulwa okusheshayo kwezinhlelo zomnotho nezombusazwe, nokwakha kabusha izikhungo zikahulumeni.

eff.desc: I-Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) igcizelela ukulingana kwezomnotho, ukubaluleka kwezinsiza zikahulumeni, nokwandisa indima kahulumeni emnothweni.

ifp.desc: I-Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) igcizelela inhlonipho yesiko lamaZulu, ukubusa okuhle, nokunakekelwa komphakathi, ikakhulukazi KwaZulu-Natali.

pa.desc: I-Patriotic Alliance (PA) igcizelela ukuvikela umphakathi, ukugxila ezidingweni zabantu basemalokishini, nokukhuthaza isizwe sokuqala (South Africa first).

vfplus.name: Freedom Front Plus
vfplus.desc: I-Freedom Front Plus (VF+) igcizelela amalungelo ama-Afrikaans, ukugxila emiphakathini emincane, kanye nenkululeko yemiphakathi yokuzilawula.

actionsa.desc: I-ActionSA ibeka phambili ukubusa okuhle, ukulwa nenkohlakalo, nokwakha umnotho ohamba phambili ngezimboni namabhizinisi.

acdp.desc: I-African Christian Democratic Party (ACDP) igcizelela izimiso zobuKristu ezinqubweni zikahulumeni, ukubaluleka komndeni, nokuziphatha okuhle.

ufc.desc: I-Unite for Change (UFC) igxile ekubuseni okuhle, ekwakheni umnotho obanzi, nasekuhlanganiseni abantu abanemvelaphi ehlukene.

udm.desc: I-United Democratic Movement (UDM) igcizelela ukubusa okuhle, ukulawula okunengqondo, nokwakha izikhungo zikahulumeni ezizinzile.

sacp.desc: I-South African Communist Party (SACP) igcizelela ubunikazi bomphakathi kwezinsiza ezinkulu, amalungelo abasebenzi, nokuguqulwa kwezinhlelo zomnotho ukuze kube nokulingana.

atm.desc: I-African Transformation Movement (ATM) igcizelela izimiso zobuKristu, ukulunga komphakathi, nokubusa okuhle okuhlonipha izikhungo.

aljama-ah.desc: I-Al Jama-ah igcizelela izimiso zobuSulumane ezinqubweni zikahulumeni, ukulunga komphakathi, kanye nokuqinisa imiphakathi yamaSulumane.

ncc.desc: I-National Coloured Congress (NCC) igxile ekumeleni nasekuvikelweni kwemiphakathi yabantu abamabalabala, kanye nokulingana kwamathuba.

pac.desc: I-Pan Africanist Congress of Azania (PAC) igcizelela i-Pan-Africanism, ukwakha isizwe esimnyama esizimele, nokulwa nobandlululo.

q1.text: Uhulumeni kufanele wengeneza amagcina kumuntu onotshiwo ngenxa yokugcina izinqumo zezampilo, izifundo, kanye nokuhabahnya.

q2.text: Imigodini yezimali kanye nokwehlukaniswa kobuhlungu kufanele kuthi isisekelo, nanoma lokhu kunciphise amagcina okuhabahnya.

q3.text: Uhulumeni kufanele ungeneze inzuzo eyisisekelo yesambazi konke umuntu.

q4.text: Uhulumeni kufanele usebenzise izinqumo zomuntu owasemsebenzini ukuciphisa imisebenzi.

q5.text: Isezampilo kufanele sibe isikhundla sesambazi, nezinqumo ezisisekelo zibe kusuki.

q6.text: Izifundo eziphakeme kufanele zibe sesuki kunabafundi onke, nanoma lokhu kucele amagcina okufa.

q7.text: Uhulumeni kufanele une subsidi enkulu yokuzihlalela izingane ukusiza abazali bakuba semsebenzini.

q8.text: Amahhovela wombuluzi kufanele aquke nokuteteza nokuhabahnya nokusinda kumuntu omnyama kanye nomuntu owesigaba.

q9.text: Uhulumeni kufanele usizele izinkampani ezincane kanye nobomadlela nge-subsidi neokuyeza umthetho.

q10.text: Izinqumo ezinkulu zesambazi (amandla, amanzi, uhambo) kufanele zibe nesambazi futhi azisebenziswe yumuntu weswazi.

q11.text: Izinkampani zeswazi zifanele zivumele ukungeneza nokuthengisa amandla ngenxa yokucisa ikhiwo lamandla, nanoma lokhu kunciphise izinga le-Eskom.

q12.text: Ukuhambisa amanzi kanye nesistimu samazi kufanele kubaluleke esambazini futhi kuze kusebenziswe yiswazi.

q13.text: Ilizwe lingathathwa ngaphandle kokubekelela umsanegu wentengo ukuze kushesha okuguqula kwelizwe.

q14.text: Ukulima kombala kanye nezikhundla zelizwe owomuntu lezinkosi kufanele zithathwe ngaphandle kwekompani elikhulu ekulima.

q15.text: Izinqumo zomuntu esikhundleni kanye nemodeli yokuhlangana kwabantu kufanele zithathwe ngemgodi yohulumeni kanye nozimali.

q16.text: Amagcina elizwe ama-ndabuko kanye ama-sangilo kufanele amukelwe ngomthetho futhi asindiswe, nanoma lokhu kufika emithethweni yesakhiwo.

q17.text: Umuntu owasemsebenzini kufanele ube nemigodi enkulu yokuthumba kanye nokumemeza, nokukhubazeka kancane.

q18.text: Imigodi yomuntu ewula kufanele yengenezwe kakhulu ukuciphisa ubuhlu ekusebenzini, nanoma lokhu kunciphise izinkampani ezincane.

q19.text: Ukulonga womuntu owasemsebenzini (kulula ukuthatha kanye nokubheka umuntu) kungeneza unabhaka nosomuntu semsebenzini.

q20.text: Amagcina esigaba semuntu (isilishwa esilubele, isilishwa sokugula, kanye nokubheka umuntu owile) kufanele yengenezwe kanye nokuzisebenziswa kulonke isigaba.

q21.text: Amapolisa kufanele ane migodi enkulu kanye nozimali ukubhekuza ikohlo elinzima, nanoma lokhu kungeneza amandla ohulumeni.

q22.text: Isikhundla sokuthi uthi njengoba ufuna kanye nokugqajwa entwaneni kufanele zithathwe okwenye nanoma lokhu kuhambisa umthengano wombuluzi.

q23.text: IseNingizimu Afrika kufanele iquke amagcina amindlela yezampilo ekuvimba umuntu kanye nomuntu wesikali.

q24.text: Imikhosi ekuchelesa kanye nokumemeza kufanele ibheke umthetho omubi kugxeka, nanoma lokhu kumkhomba esikhundla senqobo.

q25.text: Umuntu kabusha kufanele abe no-umuntu owesifundo kanye nokubhekwa ukuxwayula ubuhlu, nanoma lokhu kumkhomba okukhethwa kwesambazi.

q26.text: Amagcina okuchekela azisindiswe nanoma lokhu kuceza ukubheka umuntu onobangela okubi.

q27.text: Okubhozu lokubheka umuntu onobangela okubi kufanele lube nesikhundla kanye nokuziyinyumba, nanoma lokhu kungeneza inhlupheko esiholi.

q28.text: Amakompani ezepolitiki kufanele ene nqoba esikhundleni sayo okwenza inkolo yesambazi, nanoma lokhu kuthatha abantu abacele amakompani.

q29.text: Uhulumeni kabusha kufanele une migodi enkulu ekubhekuza umuntu kabusha ongenile umthetho, nanoma lokhu kumkhomba isikhundla sabantu.

q30.text: Abakhokheli bezepolitiki abavula imihlahlandlela, amagcina ekuchekela, noma iNkosi kufanele ane ngqikazi.

q31.text: IseNingizimu Afrika kufanele ibe nemigodini eyikade yokwehlisa amandla wechibi kanye nokushiya amandla wekoala.

q32.text: Uhulumeni kufanele webeke izimali ekwandiseni amandla abashenela ukuciphisa indlela yekoala.

q33.text: Amagcina yomuntu kanye nendlela yomuntu kufanele athathe isikali kulapho kumina koala kanye nokuthuthukisa.

q34.text: Uhulumeni kufanele uqalisele amagcina okuvimba umuntu ama-LGBTQ+ kanye nokubaluleka.

q35.text: Uhulumeni kufanele ubenjanela okulingana kwamakosikazi ngokuthwala umthetho wokuzihlalela abazali kanye nokuvimba umuntu esigabeni semuntu.

q36.text: IseNingizimu Afrika kufanele ibenjanela ukuthakwa kwamandla embuluzi ngokuthwala ukulumba okunike umthengano emasimu esezwe.

q37.text: IseNingizimu Afrika kufanele iqukie imilungu yomthengano oyinqaba futhi iwule umthetho okukinganiselela imbuluzi ezikhathini.

q38.text: Amahhovela omthengano kufanele agxile ekuteteza umbuluzi wakweli ngokuthwala amagcina kanye amithetho yombuluzi akweli.

q39.text: IseNingizimu Afrika kufanele icele amagcina okuthwala umuntu nasikhali, nanoma lokhu kungeneza ukungathethelwa amasimu ekuhambela.

q40.text: Uhulumeni kufanele ucele okugcina okushakwa umuntu ongenile ilanga, nanoma lokhu kungeneza ukuthuka ezindaweni azisebenzisa abantu bakweli.

q41.text: Ukudla kwenqoba kufanele kuzuzwe ngohlobo oluthathelelwe yomuntu wakweli kanye nokunoteza okusebenzisa isiqalo nokuthi umuntu kasali.

q42.text: IseNingizimu Afrika kufanele ibheke okushintsha okuziyinyumba nombuluzi kanye nokusebenza, futhi hhayi okuwena okwakudela.

q43.text: Ubuhlu besikhathi seapartheyidi kufanele bubhekwe ngokuthwala umhlobo ozenzela, hhayi okushintsha isigaba sonke.

q44.text: Imali yohambo kufanele ibheke okuthuthukisa amathuthuthu omuntu obambalwa, nanoma lokhu kungeneza ubuhlu bokuthi umuntu agade uhambo.

q45.text: Izinqumo zendawo yomuntu ongamukeleki kufanele zithathwe ngaphandle konakayo womuntu weswazi.

q46.text: Izindawo kufanele zibeklelezwe ngomthetho ukuvimba isigaba esingalama, esesikhundleni wekhali, kanye isigaba esizenzeka nokuthi umuntu ahambe ezinyaweni - nanoma lokhu kumkhomba amagcina womuntu.

q47.text: Imigodini yohulumeni kufanele imane enqobeni enkulu yokuthi umuntu onamadwala angazisebenzusi, nanoma lokhu kungeneza okunye isigaba.

q48.text: Uhulumeni kufanele une subsidi kanye nokuhabahnya ukubuye ambuluzi asoka kanye emasikweni.

q49.text: Amahhovela afana ne-Employment Equity kanye ne-BEE kufanele abe umuntu onobangela ekuciphisa ubuhlu obulingana, nanoma lokhu kumkhomba ukuhambisa izinkampani.

q50.text: Izinqumo zokuqeqeshwa kufanele zithathwe abantu ababe umbuhla ohlukahlukile ukubuye ukusebenza ebantwini.

disclaimer.title: Umchazelo Ombalulekile
disclaimer.educational: I-Elekti iyithuluzi lezifundo, hhayi isikhundlekelo sesisifundo. Amakompani ezepolitiki ayinto ezinengqondo enokunye okugqile okushintsha ngenjwayelo.
disclaimer.alpha: Umsaidhi uyindawo eyukela nokuqaliswa. Izinto zingashintsha, futhi idatha ingagcinwa ngoba siyabuyisela indlela yethu.
disclaimer.research: Siqhaqu kakhulu ukuthi ufunde amahhovela amakompani, ulubale emafowulamabi engaba, kanye nokuthi uqingisise imininingwane wethu ngokwakho. Sebenzisa lezi miphumela njengenqwaba yosifundo-nge-okunye, hhayi njengesinqumo sakho sokugcina.
